==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=宜兰}}

===Etymology===
With 1875 renaming from Komalan Subprefecture ({{lang|zh|噶瑪蘭廳}}), from {{etyl|nan|zh}} {{zh-l|噶瑪蘭|tr=Kat-má-lán}}, {{zh-l|蛤仔蘭|tr=Kap-chú-lân}} or {{zh-l|蛤仔難|tr=Kap-á-lān}}, names given to sites of the Kavalan tribe of Taiwanese aborigines.
